content: books from time to time all instructions for making this carpet have been first published in polish on my blog http //magiccarpetstudio blogspot com/2017/08/rekonstrukcja-dywanu-plamy html if any of the photos below are too small you can look them up in a bigger size on my blog magic carpet studio www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com i will use the us crochet notation throughout this tutorial the first part of this pattern is done in the round but it s actually a spiral so you mustn t join with a slip-stitch at the end of the round round 1 make 12 double_crochet in a magic loop the first double_crochet should be pretended by 3 chain do not close the round instead make two more double_crochet one in the first chain and another one in the second chain here indicated by arrows finally insert a marker i used a hair-pin in the last double_crochet you ve made this marker will denote the end of the round you have 14 double_crochet all around the last double_crochet has a marker in it round 2 make 2 double_crochet in each stitch all around obviously you will have to remove the marker before making 2 double_crochet in the last stitch put the marker in the last double_crochet you ve made you have 14*2 = 28 double_crochet all around the last double_crochet has a marker in it round 3 repeat 1 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in one stitch all around 14 times again you will have to pull out the marker before making 2 double_crochet in the last stitch put the marker in the last double_crochet you ve made you have 42 double_crochet all around the last double_crochet has a marker in it magic carpet studio www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com round 4 repeat 2 double_crochet in one stitch 1 double_crochet 1 double_crochet all around 14 times again you will have to pull out the marker before making a double_crochet in the last stitch put the marker in the last double_crochet you ve made you have 56 double_crochet all around the last double_crochet has a marker in it i will no longer write about pulling out the marker or placing it in a different place you ll have to remember it by yourselves round 5 repeat 1 double_crochet 1 double_crochet 1 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in one stitch all around 14 times you have 70 double_crochet all around i marked double_crochet-increase s made in the last two rounds the general idea is to make a double_crochet-increase more or less between two double_crochet-increase s from the previous round each round will have 14 stitches more than the previous round round 6 repeat 1 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in one stitch 3 double_crochet all around 14 times you have 84 double_crochet all around round 7 repeat 5 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in one stitch all around 14 times you have 98 double_crochet all around round 8 repeat 2 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in one stitch 4 double_crochet all around 14 times
